thread.title: China claimed its troops can reach New Delhi in 48 hours and everyone cracked the same joke
thread.title_full: China claimed its troops can reach New Delhi in 48 hours and everyone cracked the same joke

author: Sohini Mitter
title: China claimed its troops can reach New Delhi in 48 hours and everyone cracked the same joke
text:
Over the weekend, Indian Twitter found amusement in the not-so-amusing.
After China TV reported that Chinese troops would take only 48 hours to reach New Delhi in case of a war, Indians got chatty ‚Äî and catty ‚Äî about it.
SEE ALSO: China is about to kick America's butt in renewable energy
It all began when The International Spectator picked up the news.
CHINA: State TV says it would take country's motorised troops 48 hours and its paratroops 10 hours to reach India's capital if war broke out
‚Äî The Int'l Spectator (@spectatorindex) January 14, 2017
And Indians spoke of the roadblocks, literally, en route to Delhi.
Crucially, depends on fog situation in Delhi https://t.co/XB0Ds3WzFT
‚Äî Mihir Sharma (@mihirssharma) January 15, 2017
Rao Tula Ram Flyover dekha hai? Aur Outer Ring Road? Hahaha. 48 hours, in your dreams. https://t.co/AZVqA5AXEK
‚Äî Raheel Khursheed (@Raheelk) January 15, 2017
@spectatorindex China is 2 confident f Indian road conditions,china wld hv 2 mk roads on its own 2 reach Delhi by which time it wld b 2 late
‚Äî Sudeep Kapoor (@KapoorSudeep) January 15, 2017
It would take 48 hours for China to enter India and another 48 hours to enter Delhi. https://t.co/1UQM5xydP7
‚Äî KJ (@karan__jain) January 15, 2017
*China attempts to do it in 48 hours and fails.*
*Builds a ton of flyovers and express ways on the way back.* https://t.co/bpBbAo4MmC
‚Äî Lord Morningwood (@dangertoon) January 15, 2017
@timesnow With all that smog, how can chinese troops see their way & reach Delhi in 10 hours ? :-) .
‚Äî Typhoid Mary (@73rdraisin) January 16, 2017
I think the motorised troops must be coming mounted on their hypersonic Wu-14. Good joke to start a Sunday! Ni hao! https://t.co/SQHAAVQtNp
‚Äî Manmohan Bahadur (@BahadurManmohan) January 15, 2017
Some were funny anyway.
Dear China, Delhi is well protected by Somnath Bharti's dogs, Kejriwal's tweets and Ashutosh's English. Think twice before taking any step.
‚Äî Arnab Ray (@greatbong) January 15, 2017
Think I got the 48h Chinese threat.
Thiruvananthapuram Rajdhani Express takes ~42h.
Adding 6h from CPM Kerala HQ that makes 48h to Delhi.ü§£
‚Äî I.N.A. 99th Brigade (@INA99thBrigade) January 15, 2017
CHINA: motorised troops 48 hours, its paratroops 10 hours to reach Delhi if war broke out.
Modi- Ok then ! bye ! pic.twitter.com/V1s3ho0wZl
‚Äî ‡§ï‡§°‡•Ä ‡§®‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ Anugrah (@BreakiNews) January 15, 2017
Don't forget @narendramodi can see Chinese troops on google maps since the days he was CM üòÇ #DufferModi https://t.co/xpTPSgtIw9
‚Äî Suryanarayan Ganesh (@gsurya) January 15, 2017
And the rest were concerned. Rightly so.
If Chinese Army says it can reach Delhi within 48 hours @adgpi needs to track planning/route(Himachal/Uttrakhand) @PMOIndia @manoharparrikar
‚Äî swami prasad atwal (@swatwal75) January 16, 2017
Chinese are so inefficient? Indian troops can reach Beijing in under 6 hrs. Problem in both cases is what happens to them once they reach https://t.co/PxkrUnZCsa
‚Äî sushant sareen (@sushantsareen) January 15, 2017
Any Army crazy enough to cross himalayas will be a crazy army, Impossible to re-supply 100% of soldiers will be massacrd @spectatorindex
‚Äî V a r ƒÅ h M i h i r (@MynameisGaurav) January 15, 2017
It's being realistic.China may be strong militarily but it can't drop into Delhi.I don't out of "patriotism" say we will land in Beijing https://t.co/b0AakxEdTV
‚Äî Yusuf Unjhawala üáÆüá≥ (@YusufDFI) January 15, 2017
And "realistic" we have to be. No one wants a war right?
BONUS: Trump's 5-year-old granddaughter Arabella is huge in China
